DOC.brief_summary: Background : Progressive supranuclear palsy ( PSP ) rare neuro-degenerative disease , count among atypical parkinsonism ( AP ) . Medical treatment rehabilitation extremely limited AP , therefore would useful find new way improve motor non motor symptom PSP . The Brainway Deep Transcranial magnetic stimulation ( DTMS ) new technology TMS use particular coil , i.e . H-coil , able stimulate deeper region brain . Only study literature evaluate efficacy DTMS Parkinson 's Disease parkinsonism ; particular PSP patient , case report show improvement language .
DOC.brief_title: Deep TMS Treatment Patients With Parkinson 's Disease Progressive Supranuclear Palsy
DOC.detailed_description: Materials Methods : This study pilot , randomize , cross-over , double blind trial . It design evaluate efficacy Deep TMS term recovery motor function , freeze gait , cognitive decline patient PSP . Nineteen subject underwent 14 session high frequency DTMS 4 week period . The target leave Broca dorsolateral prefrontal cortex .
DOC.criteria: outpatient PSP accord NINDSSPSP criterion contraindication DTMS ( history seizure , pacemaker , electric device )
